publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-642# Brian Adam: Social Work Review—That the Parliament notes with concern the shortage of social workers throughout Scotland and considers that the Scottish Executive should initiate a McCrone-type review to look at social workers’ pay and conditions in order to attract and retain more social workers.

S2M-642# Brian Adam: Social Work Review-That the Parliament notes with concern the shortage of social workers throughout Scotland and considers that the Scottish Executive should initiate a McCrone-type review to look at social workers' pay and conditions in order to attract and retain more social workers.
S2M-642# Social Work Review (lodged on 20 November 2003) Margo MacDonald*
S2M-642# Social Work Review (lodged on 20 November 2003) Ms Sandra White*, Fiona Hyslop*
S2M-642# Social Work Review (lodged on 20 November 2003) Mr Adam Ingram*, Michael Matheson*

S2M-642# Social Work Review (lodged on 20 November 2003) Alasdair Morgan*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Rob Gibson*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Alex Neil*, Colin Fox*, Campbell Martin*, Tommy Sheridan*, Eleanor Scott*, Richard Lochhead*, Linda Fabiani*, Carolyn Leckie*, John Swinburne*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Christine Grahame*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S2M-642# Social Work Review (lodged on 20 November 2003) Chris Ballance*, Robin Harper*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-642# Social Work Review (lodged on 20 November 2003) Dr Jean Turner*, Mr Bruce McFee*
S2M-642# Social Work Review (lodged on 20 November 2003) Frances Curran*

S2M-642# Brian Adam: Social Work Review-That the Parliament notes with concern the shortage of social workers throughout Scotland and considers that the Scottish Executive should initiate a McCrone-type review to look at social workers' pay and conditions in order to attract and retain more social workers. Supported by: Margo MacDonald, Ms Sandra White, Fiona Hyslop, Mr Adam Ingram, Michael Matheson, Alasdair Morgan, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Rob Gibson, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Alex Neil, Colin Fox, Campbell Martin, Tommy Sheridan, Eleanor Scott, Richard Lochhead, Linda Fabiani, Carolyn Leckie, John Swinburne, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Christine Grahame, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Chris Ballance, Robin Harper, Rosie Kane, Dr Jean Turner, Mr Bruce McFee, Frances Curran
